magicbook.gtlitecore.api.sound

接口 ISoundManager

  • 所有已知实现类:
    SoundManager

    public interface ISoundManager

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String soundName)
      Register a SoundEvent.
      net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String containerName, java.lang.String soundName)
      Register a SoundEvent with custom containerName.
      net.minecraft.client.audio.ISound startTileSound(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation soundName, float volume, net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
      Starts a positioned sound at a provided BlockPos.
      void stopTileSound(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
      Stops the positioned sound playing at a given BlockPos (if any).

    • 方法详细资料

      • registerSound

        net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String soundName)
        Register a SoundEvent.

        Default to using the current active ModuleContainer id, must be registered in the Pre-Initialization Event phase.

        参数:
        soundName - The name of the sound in the resources' directory.
        返回:
        The created SoundEvent.

      • registerSound

        net.minecraft.util.SoundEvent registerSound(java.lang.String containerName,
                                            java.lang.String soundName)
        Register a SoundEvent with custom containerName.

        Custom containerName of soundName but not ModuleContainer.

        参数:
        containerName - The name of mod or module.
        soundName - The name of the sound in the resources' directory.
        返回:
        The created SoundEvent.

      • startTileSound

        net.minecraft.client.audio.ISound startTileSound(net.minecraft.util.ResourceLocation soundName,
                                                 float volume,
                                                 net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Starts a positioned sound at a provided BlockPos.
        参数:
        soundName - The name of the sound to play.
        volume - The volume multiplier of the sound.
        pos - The position to play the sound at.
        返回:
        The sound that was played.

      • stopTileSound

        void stopTileSound(net.minecraft.util.math.BlockPos pos)
        Stops the positioned sound playing at a given BlockPos (if any).
        参数:
        pos - The position to play the sound at.
